instruction: Create a list of steps to explain how to set up a voicemail greeting on a cell phone.
output:
1. Open the phone's settings.
2. Navigate to the Voicemail tab.
3. Select "Set up Voicemail".
4. Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new voicemail account.
5. Once the voicemail account is set up, select "Record Greeting" from the menu.
6. Follow the on-screen prompts to record your custom greeting.
7. Preview the greeting and press "Save" when you are satisfied.
